description: nova-compute does not accept images_path on the command line.  This means that the use_s3=false branch of image handling (i.e. the use of local cp, rather than downloading images from the object store) can only work with the built-in default value for images_path.
title: nova-compute does not accept images_path on the command line

comments.content: nova-compute does not accept images_path on the command line.  This means that the use_s3=false branch of image handling (i.e. the use of local cp, rather than downloading images from the object store) can only work with the built-in default value for images_path.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor
